{"id":698595814,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"10 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1652430835,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/698595814/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"7.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string makeGood(string s) {\n        if(s.size()==1){\n            return s;\n        }\n        int n=s.size();\n        string str=\"\";\n        \n        stack<char>stack;\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            if(stack.empty()){\n                stack.push(s[i]);\n            }\n            else{\n                if((int(stack.top())-int(s[i])==32) || (int(stack.top())-int(s[i])==-32)){\n                    stack.pop();\n                }\n                else{\n                    stack.push(s[i]);\n                }\n            }\n            }\n                    while(!stack.empty()){\n                        str=str+stack.top();\n                        stack.pop();\n                    }\n                    reverse(str.begin(), str.end());\n                    return str;\n        \n        }\n        \n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great","has_notes":false}
